summary: A reporter and her ex-husband investigate a cursed video tape that is rumored to kill the viewer seven days after watching it.
cast: Nanako Matsushima|Miki Nakatani|Yûko Takeuchi|Hitomi Satô|Yôichi Numata|Yutaka Matsushige|Katsumi Muramatsu|Rikiya Ôtaka|Masako|Daisuke Ban|Kanehiro Ri|Yûrei Yanagi|Yôko Ôshima|Kiriko Shimizu|Makoto Kakeda|Rie Ino'o|Hiroyuki Tanabe|Miwako Kaji|Yôko Honma|Asami Nagata|Yukiko Shimohira|Keiko Yoshida|Matsuyû|Ayumu Naose|Maki Ikeda|Takashi Takayama|Toshihiko Takeda|Mantarô Koichi|Shin'ichi Noda|Shigefumi Nakai|Chihiro Shirai|Yûki Takahata|Mutsuko Ôshima|Taku Kobayashi|Hiromi Murata|Kazuhiro Yokoyama|Mizuho Kinoshita|Toshinori Yoshino|Asami Ishikawa|Hiroyuki Sanada
title: The Ring (El círculo)
